English Sentence: Thank you so much, Chris. And it's truly a great honor to have the opportunity to come to this stage twice; I'm extremely grateful.

English Sentence: I have been blown away by this conference, and I want to thank all of you for the many nice comments about what I had to say the other night.
Chinese Sentence: 这个会议真是让我感到惊叹不已，我还要谢谢你们留下的 关于我上次演讲的精彩评论

English Sentence: And I say that sincerely, partly because  I need that.  Put yourselves in my position.
Chinese Sentence: 我是非常真诚的，部分原因是因为----我的确非常需要！ 你设身处地为我想想！

English Sentence: I flew on Air Force Two for eight years.
Chinese Sentence: 我坐了8年的空军二号。

English Sentence: Now I have to take off my shoes or boots to get on an airplane!
Chinese Sentence: 不过现在上飞机前我则要脱掉我的鞋子

English Sentence: I'll tell you one quick story to illustrate what that's been like for me.
Chinese Sentence: 我给你讲个小故事来形容我现在是什么样的

English Sentence: It's a true story -- every bit of this is true.
Chinese Sentence: 这是个真实的故事--每一点都是如此。

English Sentence: Soon after Tipper and I left the --  White House --  we were driving from our home in Nashville to a little farm we have 50 miles east of Nashville.
Chinese Sentence: 就在我和Tipper离开白宫稍后不久 -- -- 我们驱车从纳什维尔的家开到 我们在东边50里外的一个小农场--

English Sentence: Driving ourselves.
Chinese Sentence: 自己开车

English Sentence: I know it sounds like a little thing to you, but -- I looked in the rear-view mirror and all of a sudden it just hit me.
Chinese Sentence: 我知道这对你们来说是小事一桩，但是 ---- 正当我看着后视镜的时候，突然感到非常惊奇。

English Sentence: There was no motorcade back there.
Chinese Sentence: 后面竟然没有车队。

English Sentence: You've heard of phantom limb pain?
Chinese Sentence: 你们听过幻肢痛么？

English Sentence: This was a rented Ford Taurus.  It was dinnertime, and we started looking for a place to eat.
Chinese Sentence: 这辆福特Taurus是租来的，这时刚好是晚饭的时候 我们就开始找吃饭的地方

English Sentence: We were on I-40. We got to Exit 238, Lebanon, Tennessee.

English Sentence: We got off the exit, we found a Shoney's restaurant.
Chinese Sentence: 我们从出口下来，开始寻找一家--我们找到了Shoney餐馆。

English Sentence: Low-cost family restaurant chain, for those of you who don't know it.
Chinese Sentence: 你们有些人也许不知道，这是家低成本的家庭连锁餐厅

English Sentence: We went in and sat down at the booth, and the waitress came over, made a big commotion over Tipper.  She took our order, and then went to the couple in the booth next to us, and she lowered her voice so much, I had to really strain to hear what she was saying.
Chinese Sentence: 我们走进去后坐在小亭子里，女服务员也走了过来。 我跟Tipper引起了一阵骚动。 她写单后走到我们旁边亭子里的一对情侣边， 然后她的声音变得非常小以至于我要竖起耳朵才能听到她在说什么

English Sentence: And she said "Yes, that's former Vice President Al Gore and his wife, Tipper."
Chinese Sentence: 接着她说”是的，他们就是前副总统艾尔·戈尔和他的妻子Tipper。“

English Sentence: And the man said, "He's come down a long way, hasn't he?"
Chinese Sentence: 那个男的接着说，“他已经非常努力了，不是吗？“

English Sentence: There's been kind of a series of epiphanies.
Chinese Sentence: 已经算是有些显灵了。

English Sentence: The very next day, continuing the totally true story, I got on a G-V to fly to Africa to make a speech in Nigeria, in the city of Lagos, on the topic of energy.
Chinese Sentence: 第二天，继续一个完全真实的故事。 我登上G-5就飞到非洲的尼尔利亚做演讲去了， 在首都拉各斯，主题则是关于能源。

English Sentence: And I began the speech by telling them the story of what had just happened the day before in Nashville.

English Sentence: And I told it pretty much the same way I've just shared it with you: Tipper and I were driving ourselves, Shoney's, low-cost family restaurant chain, what the man said -- they laughed.

And with what Vinod, and John Doerr and others, many of you here -- there are a lot of people directly involved in this -- this wedge is going to grow much more rapidly than the current projection shows it.

Chinese Sentence: 想出一些其他更好的替代方案，这是非常重要的。

Chinese Sentence: 这样的话我就会在今年夏天带一个课程 给那帮获得提名的人们上一课。 全体的，在全国各地的社区， 每个星期我们也会为他们更新这些幻灯片 来保证资料都处在最前沿。

English Sentence: Working with Larry Lessig, it will be, somewhere in that process, posted with tools and limited-use copyrights, so that young people can remix it and do it in their own way.
Chinese Sentence: 和拉里·莱斯格一起工作，那会是，在过程中的某个阶段。 用工具和限量使用版权来张贴， 那样的话年轻人就可以用他们自己的方法重新制作。

English Sentence: Where did anybody get the idea that you ought to stay arm's length from politics?
Chinese Sentence: 人们都是从哪里得知应该跟政治保持距离呢？

English Sentence: It doesn't mean that if you're a Republican, that I'm trying to convince you to be a Democrat.
Chinese Sentence: 这无关你是否是共和党人然后我要说服你变成一个民主党人士。

English Sentence: We need Republicans as well. This used to be a bipartisan issue, and I know that in this group it really is. Become politically active.
Chinese Sentence: 我们也需要共和党人。这是个两党连立的问题， 据我所知这在我们这个团体里面的确是如此的。变成政治活跃人士。

English Sentence: Make our democracy work the way it's supposed to work.
Chinese Sentence: 使我们的民主照着原本应该的方式来运作。

English Sentence: Support the idea of capping carbon dioxide emissions -- global warming pollution -- and trading it.
Chinese Sentence: 支持关于二氧化碳排放和全球温室效应污染的理念，

English Sentence: Here's why: as long as the United States is out of the world system, it's not a closed system.
Chinese Sentence: 并且补偿这一切，这是因为，由于美国在这个世界体系之外， 但是这又不是个封闭的体系。

English Sentence: Once it becomes a closed system, with U.S. participation, then everybody who's on a board of directors -- how many people here serve on the board of directors of a corporation?
Chinese Sentence: 但是一旦它变成了封闭的体系，不管美国是否参与， 那样的话每个人都成为董事会成员了 --这里有多少人是公司里面的董事会成员呢？

English Sentence: Once it's a closed system, you will have legal liability if you do not urge your CEO to get the maximum income from reducing and trading the carbon emissions that can be avoided.
Chinese Sentence: 一旦它成为一个封闭的体系，你将背负法律上的责任如果你不督促你的CEO 从减少和补偿可以避免的碳排放方面获得最大的收入。

English Sentence: The market will work to solve this problem -- if we can accomplish this.
Chinese Sentence: 如果我们能够实现它的话那么市场先生将会自己去解决这个问题。

English Sentence: Help with the mass persuasion campaign that will start this spring.
Chinese Sentence: 从今年春天开始的大众劝说运动的帮助。

English Sentence: We have to change the minds of the American people.
Chinese Sentence: 我们必须去改变美国人民的观念。

English Sentence: Because presently, the politicians do not have permission to do what needs to be done.
Chinese Sentence: 因为现在的政治不允许去做一些需要做的事。

English Sentence: And in our modern country, the role of logic and reason no longer includes mediating between wealth and power the way it once did.
Chinese Sentence: 在一个现代化国家，逻辑和理性的作用已不再只包括 以前所做的关于财富和权力的调解。

English Sentence: It's now repetition of short, hot-button, 30-second, 28-second television ads.
Chinese Sentence: 现在已经是短的，热门的，30秒，28秒的电视广告的重复播放。

English Sentence: We have to buy a lot of those ads.
Chinese Sentence: 我们必须要买许多这样的广告。

English Sentence: Let's re-brand global warming, as many of you have suggested.
Chinese Sentence: 让我们把全球变暖这个品牌重新包装一下，就如许多人建议的那样。

English Sentence: I like "climate crisis" instead of "climate collapse," but again, those of you who are good at branding, I need your help on this.
Chinese Sentence: 相对于气候崩溃我更喜欢气候危机这个叫法， 老调重谈一下，如果你们谁对品牌运作方面相当在行的话，我需要你们的帮助。

English Sentence: Somebody said the test we're facing now, a scientist told me, is whether the combination of an opposable thumb and a neocortex is a viable combination.
Chinese Sentence: 有个科学家告诉我，有人说我们现在面对的检验是， 对生拇指和新皮层的组合是否是 一种可以实行的组合。

English Sentence: That's really true. I said the other night, and I'll repeat now: this is not a political issue.
Chinese Sentence: 这是真的。上次我也说过了，但是我现在再重复一次：这不是政治问题。

English Sentence: Again, the Republicans here -- this shouldn't be partisan.
Chinese Sentence: 今天来的共和党人们，这不应该是党派性的。

English Sentence: You have more influence than some of us who are Democrats do.
Chinese Sentence: 你甚至比在我们这里的有些共和党人更加具有影响力。

English Sentence: This is an opportunity. Not just this, but connected to the ideas that are here, to bring more coherence to them.
Chinese Sentence: 这不止是个很好的机会，更可以把今天我们在这里的想法连接到 并一致的带给其他人。

English Sentence: We are one.
Chinese Sentence: 我们是整体。

English Sentence: Thank you very much, I appreciate it.
Chinese Sentence: 谢谢感谢，我非常的感激。

English Sentence: In terms of invention, I'd like to tell you the tale of one of my favorite projects.
Chinese Sentence: 说到发明 我想跟你们说说我最得意的一个项目

English Sentence: I think it's one of the most exciting that I'm working on, but I think it's also the simplest.
Chinese Sentence: 我觉得它是我现在做的最令我兴奋的项目 同时也是最简单的一个

English Sentence: It's a project that has the potential to make a huge impact around the world.
Chinese Sentence: 这个项目很可能极大地影响世界

English Sentence: It addresses one of the biggest health issues on the planet, the number one cause of death in children under five.
Chinese Sentence: 它能解决目前世界上最严重的健康问题之一 这个问题是5岁以下儿童死亡的头号杀手

English Sentence: Which is ...? Water-borne diseases? Diarrhea? Malnutrition?
Chinese Sentence: 是什么呢？ 水媒传染疾病？痢疾？营养不良？

English Sentence: No. It's breathing the smoke from indoor cooking fires -- acute respiratory infections caused by this. Can you believe that?
Chinese Sentence: 都不对，是吸入厨房油烟 导致急性呼吸道感染，你相信吗？

English Sentence: I find this shocking and somewhat appalling.
Chinese Sentence: 我感到很震惊也很可怕

English Sentence: Can't we make cleaner burning cooking fuels?
Chinese Sentence: 我们能否发明更清洁的炊事燃料？

English Sentence: Can't we make better stoves?
Chinese Sentence: 更好的炉灶？

English Sentence: How is it that this can lead to over two million deaths every year?
Chinese Sentence: 这个问题为何每年能杀死200多万人呢？

English Sentence: I know Bill Joy was talking to you about the wonders of carbon nanotubes, so I'm going to talk to you about the wonders of carbon macro-tubes, which is charcoal.  So this is a picture of rural Haiti. Haiti is now 98 percent deforested.
Chinese Sentence: 我知道Bill Joy和大家讲过 碳纳管的奇妙之处 那今天我就和大家讲讲 大碳管也就是木炭的妙用 这是一张海地乡村的照片，海地国土面积的98%如今都没有森林覆盖了

English Sentence: You'll see scenes like this all over the island.
Chinese Sentence: 整个海地岛屿都是这幅景象

English Sentence: It leads to all sorts of environmental problems and problems that affect people throughout the nation.
Chinese Sentence: 这造成了各种环境问题 以及一些影响海地人民的其他问题

English Sentence: A couple years ago there was severe flooding that led to thousands of deaths -- that's directly attributable to the fact that there are no trees on the hills to stabilize the soil.
Chinese Sentence: 几年前一场洪水肆虐 夺走了几千人的生命 这都是因为 山上没有树来巩固土壤

English Sentence: So the rains come -- they go down the rivers and the flooding happens.
Chinese Sentence: 所以一旦下雨，雨水混杂泥土直接冲入河流，造成洪灾

English Sentence: Now one of the reasons why there are so few trees is this: people need to cook, and they harvest wood and they make charcoal in order to do it.
Chinese Sentence: 这里没树主要是因为 人们烧饭需要燃料 于是人们把木材做成木炭

English Sentence: It's not that people are ignorant to the environmental damage.
Chinese Sentence: 并不是海地人不重视环境保护

English Sentence: They know perfectly well, but they have no other choice.
Chinese Sentence: 他们明白环境重要，但是他们无可奈何

English Sentence: Fossil fuels are not available, and solar energy doesn't cook the way that they like their food prepared.
Chinese Sentence: 这里没有化石燃料 太阳能也不是很好用

English Sentence: And so this is what they do.
Chinese Sentence: 所以这也算是无奈之举

English Sentence: You'll find families like this who go out into the forest to find a tree, cut it down and make charcoal out of it.
Chinese Sentence: 你常能看到这样一家人一起去森林里 砍了树，再做成木炭

English Sentence: So not surprisingly, there's a lot of effort that's been done to look at alternative cooking fuels.
Chinese Sentence: 毫无疑问，人们已经很努力 找寻这种燃料的替代品了

English Sentence: About four years ago, I took a team of students down to Haiti and we worked with Peace Corps volunteers there.
Chinese Sentence: 4年前，我和一群学生去海地 和当地的和平队志愿者一起工作

English Sentence: This is one such volunteer and this is a device that he had built in the village where he worked.
Chinese Sentence: 有一个志愿者 在他呆的村庄里发明了这个小玩意儿

English Sentence: And the idea was that you could take waste paper; you could compress it and make briquettes that could be used for fuel.
Chinese Sentence: 就是把废纸 压缩成块状用来燃烧

English Sentence: But this device was very slow.
Chinese Sentence: 但是它烧得很慢

English Sentence: So our engineering students went to work on it and with some very simple changes, they were able to triple the throughput of this device.
Chinese Sentence: 我们工程系的学生就拿来改良了一下 做了一点小改动之后 它的效率提高了3倍

English Sentence: So you could imagine they were very excited about it.
Chinese Sentence: 他们当时非常激动

English Sentence: And they took the briquettes back to MIT so that they could test them.
Chinese Sentence: 后来他们还把这些纸砖块带回麻省大学做测试

English Sentence: And one of the things that they found was they didn't burn.
Chinese Sentence: 结果却发现这些东西不能燃烧

English Sentence: So it was a little discouraging to the students.
Chinese Sentence: 学生们都挺失望的

English Sentence: And in fact, if you look closely, right here you can see it says, "US Peace Corps."
Chinese Sentence: 如果你仔细看，在这儿， 你就会发现“美国和平队”字样

English Sentence: As it turns out, there actually wasn't any waste paper in this village.
Chinese Sentence: 因为在那个村庄里根本没废纸

English Sentence: And while it was a good use of government paperwork for this volunteer to bring it back with him to his village, it was 800 kilometers away.
Chinese Sentence: 或许这仪器用来处理政府文书倒是挺好的 让那个志愿者把政府文书带回到那个村子 不过政府机关离那个村子有足足800公里之遥

English Sentence: And so we thought perhaps there might be a better way to come up with an alternative cooking fuel.
Chinese Sentence: 所以我们就想琢磨个更好的办法 来制造炊事燃料的替代品

English Sentence: What we wanted to do is we wanted to make a fuel that used something that was readily available on the local level.
Chinese Sentence: 我们希望这种新燃料 能就地取材

English Sentence: You see these all over Haiti as well. They're small-scale sugar mills.
Chinese Sentence: 海地到处都有小规模的制糖厂

English Sentence: And the waste product from them after you extract the juice from the sugarcane is called "bagasse."
Chinese Sentence: 这些厂的废料 也就是榨完甘蔗之后剩下的东西叫“甘蔗渣”

English Sentence: It has no nutritional value, so they don't feed it to the animals.
Chinese Sentence: 这个没啥用，也没营养价值 当饲料都不够好

English Sentence: It just sits in a pile near the sugar mill until eventually they burn it.
Chinese Sentence: 人们就把成堆的甘蔗渣堆在制糖厂外，最后拿来烧掉

English Sentence: What we wanted to do was we wanted to find a way to harness this waste resource and turn it into a fuel that would be something that people could easily cook with, something like charcoal.
Chinese Sentence: 而我们就想 变废为宝 把那些甘蔗渣做成人人都能方便使用的燃料 就像木炭一样

English Sentence: So over the next couple of years, students and I worked to develop a process.
Chinese Sentence: 接下来的几年时间里，我和我的学生就在开发合适的生产工艺

English Sentence: So you start with the bagasse, and then you take a very simple kiln that you can make out of a waste fifty five-gallon oil drum.
Chinese Sentence: 首先我们把甘蔗渣放入一个窑炉 这种炉子很好做，拿一个废弃的55加仑容积的油桶就可以改装了

English Sentence: After some time, after setting it on fire, you seal it to restrict the oxygen that goes into the kiln, and then you end up with this carbonized material here.
Chinese Sentence: 然后我们点燃甘蔗渣，让它烧一小会儿以后就把炉封好 不要让空气进去 最后就制成了这种炭化材料

English Sentence: However, you can't burn this.
Chinese Sentence: 但是，这个不好用，因为颗粒太细了

English Sentence: It's too fine and it burns too quickly to be useful for cooking.
Chinese Sentence: 用来烧饭的话一下就烧完了

English Sentence: So we had to try to find a way to form it into useful briquettes.
Chinese Sentence: 所以我们就设法把它压缩成块

English Sentence: And conveniently, one of my students was from Ghana, and he remembered a dish his mom used to make for him called "kokonte," which is a very sticky porridge made out of the cassava root.
Chinese Sentence: 正好，我的一个学生是加纳人 记得他母亲给他做过一道菜叫“木薯糊” 就是用木薯的根烧成的很稠的粥

English Sentence: And so what we did was we looked, and we found that cassava is indeed grown in Haiti, under the name of "manioc."
Chinese Sentence: 于是我们就四下寻找 发现海地也种植木薯，只不过叫法不同

English Sentence: In fact, it's grown all over the world -- yucca, tapioca, manioc, cassava, it's all the same thing -- a very starchy root vegetable.
Chinese Sentence: 其实世界上很多地方都有木薯 虽然名称各异，东西都是一样的 就是含淀粉的食用其块状根的植物

English Sentence: And you can make a very thick, sticky porridge out of it, which you can use to bind together the charcoal briquettes.
Chinese Sentence: 你可以把它做成糊 再用这个糊把木炭块粘在一起

English Sentence: So we did this. We went down to Haiti.
Chinese Sentence: 我们就这么做了。 后来我们又去海地

English Sentence: These are the graduates of the first Ecole de Charbon, or Charcoal Institute.
Chinese Sentence: 这些研究生就是第一所 木炭学院的学生

English Sentence: That's right. So I'm actually an instructor at MIT as well as CIT.
Chinese Sentence: 没错，所以我既是麻省理工的导师也是木碳学院的导师

English Sentence: And these are the briquettes that we made.
Chinese Sentence: 这些就是我们做的炭砖

English Sentence: Now I'm going to take you to a different continent. This is India and this is the most commonly used cooking fuel in India. It's cow dung.
Chinese Sentence: 现在我们到亚洲再来看看印度 这是印度最常见的炊事燃料——牛粪

English Sentence: And more than in Haiti, this produces really smoky fires, and this is where you see the health impacts of cooking with cow dung and biomass as a fuel.
Chinese Sentence: 这产生的油烟比海地的还厉害 你看，健康问题 就是因为燃烧牛粪或其他生物燃料造成的

English Sentence: Kids and women are especially affected by it, because they're the ones who are around the cooking fires.
Chinese Sentence: 儿童和妇女尤受影响 因为他们经常在厨房里转悠

English Sentence: So we wanted to see if we could introduce this charcoal-making technology there.
Chinese Sentence: 我们想看看是否能引进 之前的制炭技术

English Sentence: Well, unfortunately, they didn't have sugarcane and they didn't have cassava, but that didn't stop us.
Chinese Sentence: 可惜，印度没甘蔗 也没木薯，但这些都难不倒我们

English Sentence: What we did was we found what were the locally available sources of biomass.
Chinese Sentence: 我们还是就地取材

English Sentence: And there was wheat straw and there was rice straw in this area.
Chinese Sentence: 用这里的麦秆和稻秆加工成燃料

English Sentence: And what we could use as a binder was actually small amounts of cow manure, which they used ordinarily for their fuel.
Chinese Sentence: 至于粘合剂 就用少量的牛粪 而原本这些牛粪都是直接做燃料的

English Sentence: And we did side-by-side tests, and here you can see the charcoal briquettes and here the cow dung.
Chinese Sentence: 我们做了些对比试验，大家可以看到 炭砖和牛粪做对比

English Sentence: And you can see that it's a lot cleaner burning of a cooking fuel.
Chinese Sentence: 很明显炭砖清洁得多

English Sentence: And in fact, it heats the water a lot more quickly.
Chinese Sentence: 而且烧水速度也快很多

English Sentence: And so we were very happy, thus far.
Chinese Sentence: 所以我们都很开心

English Sentence: But one of the things that we found was when we did side-by-side comparisons with wood charcoal, it didn't burn as long. And the briquettes crumbled a little bit and we lost energy as they fell apart as they were cooking.
Chinese Sentence: 但是我们发现 和一般木炭比 炭砖不持久，一下就碎了 于是热量就分散开来，导致烧饭的时候很费力

English Sentence: So we wanted to try to find a way to make a stronger briquette so that we could compete with wood charcoal in the markets in Haiti.
Chinese Sentence: 我们就想办法把炭砖做得更紧实 这样就能和海地市场上的木炭竞争了

English Sentence: So we went back to MIT, we took out the Instron machine and we figured out what sort of forces you needed in order to compress a briquette to the level that you actually are getting improved performance out of it?
Chinese Sentence: 我们回到麻省，找出英斯特朗电子强力测试仪 分析出用多少压缩力度 压缩出的炭砖 会有一个质的飞跃

English Sentence: And at the same time that we had students in the lab looking at this, we also had community partners in Haiti working to develop the process, to improve it and make it more accessible to people in the villages there.
Chinese Sentence: 一方面我的学生们在实验室里研究 一方面海地的社区伙伴也同我们合作 努力改良炭砖，让人人都用得上

English Sentence: And after some time, we developed a low-cost press that allows you to produce charcoal, actually, it burns longer, cleaner than wood charcoal.
Chinese Sentence: 一段时间之后 我们发明了低成本制木炭法，新的产品 比一般木炭燃烧更持久也更清洁

English Sentence: So now we're in a situation where we have a product, which is actually better than what you can buy in Haiti in the marketplace, which is a very wonderful place to be.
Chinese Sentence: 所以我们现在就有一个 比海地市场上的木炭更好的产品 这是一个很好的状况

English Sentence: In Haiti alone, about 30 million trees are cut down every year.
Chinese Sentence: 仅海地一国，每年就有3000万棵树被砍伐

English Sentence: There's a possibility of this being implemented and saving a good portion of those.
Chinese Sentence: 这个产品如果能得到应用 能救很多树

English Sentence: In addition, the revenue generated from that charcoal is 260 million dollars.
Chinese Sentence: 另外，这种新木炭每年能创收2.6亿美元

English Sentence: That's an awful lot for a country like Haiti -- with a population of eight million and an average income of less than 400 dollars.
Chinese Sentence: 这可是一大笔钱 海地人口800万 人均收入不足400美元

English Sentence: So this is where we're also moving ahead with our charcoal project.
Chinese Sentence: 因此我们想在海地继续这个木炭项目

English Sentence: And one of the things that I think is also interesting, is I have a friend up at UC Berkeley who's been doing risk analysis.
Chinese Sentence: 还有一件有意思的事情是 我有个朋友在伯克利大学是做风险研究的

English Sentence: And he's looked at the problem of the health impacts of burning wood versus charcoal.
Chinese Sentence: 他研究了对健康 木材和木炭分别会造成什么影响 他发现只要改用木炭作燃料

English Sentence: And he's found that worldwide, you could prevent a million deaths switching from wood to charcoal as a cooking fuel.
Chinese Sentence: 在世界范围内就能有100万人可以幸免于难 这真是很棒 本来做木炭都是需要木材的

English Sentence: But now we have a way that's using an agricultural waste material to create a cooking fuel.
Chinese Sentence: 但现在我们能 变农业废物为炊事燃料

English Sentence: One of the really exciting things, though, is something that came out of the trip that I took to Ghana just last month.
Chinese Sentence: 最让人激动的是 上个月我去加纳时了解到的一个信息

English Sentence: And I think it's the coolest thing, and it's even lower tech than what you just saw, if you can imagine such a thing. Here it is.
Chinese Sentence: 这个不但非常酷 而且在技术层面上也比前面的那些更简单 如果你们能想象的到的话。就是这个。

English Sentence: So what is this? This is corncobs turned into charcoal.
Chinese Sentence: 这是什么呢？这是把玉米棒做成木炭

English Sentence: And the beauty of this is that you don't need to form briquettes -- it comes ready made. This is my $100 laptop, right here.
Chinese Sentence: 这个的好处就是你都不需要把炭压缩成块 因为玉米棒本来就是一块块的。 这就是我的100美元手提电脑项目了

English Sentence: And actually, like Nick, I brought samples.
Chinese Sentence: 和尼克一样，我也带了样品给大家

English Sentence: So we can pass these around.
Chinese Sentence: 大家相互传一下

English Sentence: They're fully functional, field-tested, ready to roll out.
Chinese Sentence: 很好用，经过测试，能立刻燃烧

English Sentence: which is also remarkable about this technology, is that the technology transfer is so easy.
Chinese Sentence: 这项技术妙在 容易转让

English Sentence: Compared to the sugarcane charcoal, where we have to teach people how to form it into briquettes and you have the extra step of cooking the binder, And this is about the most exciting thing in my life right now, which is perhaps a sad commentary on my life.
Chinese Sentence: 就甘蔗木炭而言 我们要培训当地人如何压缩木炭 还要多出一步制粘合剂 玉米棒木炭自己成型，不需经过压缩的步骤 而这是我一生中最让我激动的事了 也是我一个小小的遗憾的注脚

English Sentence: But once you see it, like you guys in the front row -- All right, yeah, OK.
Chinese Sentence: 但是一旦你见过，就像第一排的人 恩，对，反正

English Sentence: And this is, I think, a perfect example of what Robert Wright was talking about in those non-zero-sum things.
Chinese Sentence: 我觉得这是最能 体现罗伯特.怀特说的非零和事物

English Sentence: So not only do you have health benefits, you have environmental benefits.
Chinese Sentence: 这不光有利健康 有利环境

English Sentence: But this is one of the incredibly rare situations where you also have economic benefits.
Chinese Sentence: 更难得的是 还有经济效益

English Sentence: People can make their own cooking fuel from waste products.
Chinese Sentence: 人们用废农作物就可以烧饭

English Sentence: They can generate income from this.
Chinese Sentence: 还能赚钱

English Sentence: They can save the money that they were going to spend on charcoal and they can produce excess and sell it in the market to people who aren't making their own.
Chinese Sentence: 他们能省下原本买木炭的钱 自己生产销售 卖给别人

English Sentence: It's really rare that you don't have trade-offs between health and economics, or environment and economics.
Chinese Sentence: 难得的是，这不会造成 健康与经济发展，或环境与经济不可兼得的窘境

English Sentence: So this is a project that I just find extremely exciting and I'm really looking forward to see where it takes us.
Chinese Sentence: 所以这个项目最振奋人心了 我期望看到它未来的发展前景

English Sentence: So when we talk about, now, the future we will create, one of the things that I think is necessary is to have a very clear vision of the world that we live in.
Chinese Sentence: 讲到未来 我觉得有必要 清晰地认识我们所处的这个世界

English Sentence: And now, I don't actually mean the world that we live in.
Chinese Sentence: 我不是指我们自己生活的这个小世界

English Sentence: I mean the world where women spend two to three hours everyday grinding grain for their families to eat.
Chinese Sentence: 而是另一个世界。在那里，妇女每天花2-3个小时 碾谷才能养活家人

English Sentence: I mean the world where advanced building materials means cement roofing tiles that are made by hand, and where, when you work 10 hours a day, you're still only earning 60 dollars in a month.
Chinese Sentence: 在那里，所谓的高级建材 其实就是人工造的水泥屋顶板 在那里，就算你一天做10小时 一个月也才赚60美元

English Sentence: I mean the world where women and children spend 40 billion hours a year fetching water.
Chinese Sentence: 在那里，妇女和儿童成天做的就是打水，一年400亿小时

English Sentence: That's as if the entire workforce of the state of California worked full time for a year doing nothing but fetching water.
Chinese Sentence: 工时相当加州所有劳动力的集合 整年全职打水

English Sentence: It's a place where, for example, if this were India, in this room, only three of us would have a car.
Chinese Sentence: 如果这里是印度 那么在坐的只有三分之一的人有车

English Sentence: If this were Afghanistan, only one person in this room would know how the use the Internet.
Chinese Sentence: 如果是阿富汗 在坐的只有一人知道怎么上网

English Sentence: If this were Zambia -- 300 of you would be farmers, 100 of you would have AIDS or HIV.
Chinese Sentence: 如果是赞比亚，你们中就有300个农民 100个人有艾滋病或感染艾滋病毒

English Sentence: And more than half of you would be living on less than a dollar a day.
Chinese Sentence: 一半以上的人日收入不足1美元

English Sentence: These are the issues that we need to come up with solutions for.
Chinese Sentence: 这些问题都摆在我们面前

English Sentence: These are the issues that we need to be training our engineers, our designers, our business people, our entrepreneurs to be facing.
Chinese Sentence: 需要我们培训工程师 设计师，商人，企业家来解决

English Sentence: These are the solutions that we need to find.
Chinese Sentence: 这些才是需要尽快解决的问题

English Sentence: I have a few areas that I believe are especially important that we address.
Chinese Sentence: 有些问题我觉得特别重要

English Sentence: One of them is creating technologies to promote micro-finance and micro-enterprise, so that people who are living below the poverty line can find a way to move out -- and that they're not doing it using the same traditional basket making, poultry rearing, etc.
Chinese Sentence: 一个就是寻找技术来推广小型金融和小型企业 那生活在贫困线以下的人就有了出路 而不是像现在这样 通过传统的编篮子、养家禽来谋生

English Sentence: But there are new technologies and new products that they can make on a small scale.
Chinese Sentence: 现在我们已经有了 能小规模运作的新技术和新产品

English Sentence: The next thing I believe is that we need to create technologies for poor farmers to add value to their own crops.
Chinese Sentence: 另外，我们还需要为贫苦农民发明新技术 增加农作物价值

English Sentence: And we need to rethink our development strategies, so that we're not promoting educational campaigns to get them to stop being farmers, but rather to stop being poor farmers.
Chinese Sentence: 我们还需要重新思考我们的发展策略 推广教育 不是让他们都不做农民 而是不做穷苦农民

English Sentence: And we need to think about how we can do that effectively.
Chinese Sentence: 我们还要思考如何提高效率

English Sentence: We need to work with the people in these communities and give them the resources and the tools that they need to solve their own problems. That's the best way to do it.
Chinese Sentence: 我们需要和社区合作 提供他们所需的资源和工具 来解决他们的问题。这是最好的方法

English Sentence: We shouldn't be doing it from outside.
Chinese Sentence: 我们不能只做外在的努力

English Sentence: So we need to create this future, and we need to start doing it now.
Chinese Sentence: 我们要创造未来，就要从现在开始

English Sentence: Thank you.
Chinese Sentence: 谢谢

English Sentence: Chris Anderson: Thank you, incredible. Stay here. Tell us -- just while we see if someone has a question -- just tell us about one of the other things that you've worked on.
Chinese Sentence: （鼓掌） 主持人安德森：我们来看看有没有观众要提问的 与此同时你能不能再说说你做过的其他事情

English Sentence: Amy Smith: Some of the other things we're working on are ways to do low-cost water quality testing, so that communities can maintain their own water systems, know when they're working, know when they treat them, etc.
Chinese Sentence: 艾米.史密斯：现在我们在研究 低成本水质测试法 帮助社区维护水系统 使他们知道他们的系统什么时候有效，什么时候需要清洁处理等等

English Sentence: We're also looking at low-cost water-treatment systems.
Chinese Sentence: 我们也在寻求低成本水治理系统

English Sentence: One of the really exciting things is looking at solar water disinfection and improving the ability to be able to do that.
Chinese Sentence: 比如利用太阳能消毒，这很棒的 但我们还需要提高它的效率

English Sentence: CA: What's the bottleneck preventing this stuff getting from scale?
Chinese Sentence: 主持人：有什么瓶颈问题会阻碍这项技术得到推广？

English Sentence: Do you need to find entrepreneurs, or venture capitalists, or what do you need to take what you've got and get it to scale?
Chinese Sentence: 是否需要企业家，风险资本帮助 或是其他帮助推广该技术？

English Sentence: AS: I think it's large numbers of people moving it forward.
Chinese Sentence: 艾米.史密斯：要的，这需要很多人合作

English Sentence: It's a difficult thing -- it's a marketplace which is very fragmented and a consumer population with no income.
Chinese Sentence: 这很难，因为这个市场很零散 消费群体又没什么收入

English Sentence: So you can't use the same models that you use in the United States for making things move forward.
Chinese Sentence: 所以美国的商业模式 不能助其发展

English Sentence: And we're a pretty small staff, which is me.
Chinese Sentence: 而且我们人手不足，就我一个光杆司令

English Sentence: So, you know, I do what I can with the students.
Chinese Sentence: 所以我和我的学生会尽我们所能

English Sentence: We have 30 students a year go out into the field and try to implement this and move it forward.
Chinese Sentence: 我们有30个学生在这个领域研究 如何应用并推广这些技术

English Sentence: The other thing is you have to do things with a long time frame, as, you know, you can't expect to get something done in a year or two years; you have to be looking five or 10 years ahead.
Chinese Sentence: 另外，这些事是长期工程 不可能一蹴而就 这需要5-10年时间

English Sentence: But I think with the vision to do that, we can move forward.
Chinese Sentence: 但是我相信只要有信心我们就能成功

English Sentence: A public, Dewey long ago observed, is constituted through discussion and debate.
Chinese Sentence: “共和”概念，正如美国哲学家杜威很久之前所观察到的， 通过辩论和讨论而成。

English Sentence: If we are to call the tyranny of assumptions into question, and avoid doxa, the realm of the unquestioned, then we must be willing to subject our own assumptions to debate and discussion.
Chinese Sentence: 如果我们质疑暴政的假想， 避免不经推敲的教条， 那么我们必须愿意把自己的假想 进行讨论辨伪。

English Sentence: It is in this spirit that I join into a discussion of one of the critical issues of our time, namely, how to mobilize different forms of capital for the project of state building.
Chinese Sentence: 正是秉着这种精神我才来此参与讨论 这个我们时代的关键议题， 即如何调动各式各样的资本 为国家重建服务。

English Sentence: To put the assumptions very clearly: capitalism, after 150 years, has become acceptable, and so has democracy.
Chinese Sentence: 首先明晰我们的假设， 资本主义经过150年的发展已被广为接受， 民主亦然。

English Sentence: If we looked in the world of 1945 and looked at the map of capitalist economies and democratic polities, they were the rare exception, not the norm.
Chinese Sentence: 如果我们回看1945年的世界， 并且查看当时资本主义经济体系及民主政治版图， 它们只是少数，并非主流。

English Sentence: The question now, however, is both about which form of capitalism and which type of democratic participation.
Chinese Sentence: 然而目前的问题是， 选择何种资本主义体制 及何种民主参与机制。

English Sentence: But we must acknowledge that this moment has brought about a rare consensus of assumptions.
Chinese Sentence: 但我们必须承认 此刻要唤起 宝贵的共识达成一致。

English Sentence: And that provides the ground for a type of action, because consensus of each moment allows us to act.
Chinese Sentence: 及提供基础 以促成一种行动， 因为每个时刻的共识 能让我们共同行动。

English Sentence: And it is necessary, no matter how fragile or how provisional our consensus, to be able to move forward.
Chinese Sentence: 而且这是必须的，不管 我们的共识如何脆弱或短暂， 共识能让我们前进。

English Sentence: But the majority of the world neither benefits from capitalism nor from democratic systems.
Chinese Sentence: 但是世界大部分地区 既没有从资本主义体系获利 也没有从民主体系里获利。

English Sentence: Most of the globe experiences the state as repressive, as an organization that is concerned about denial of rights, about denial of justice, rather than provision of it.
Chinese Sentence: 全球大部分国家的经历 都是认为美国是压抑性的 作为一种 关注拒绝权利 否认正义的组织， 而不是提供权利和正义的机构。

English Sentence: And in terms of experience of capitalism, that the rest of the globe experiences.
Chinese Sentence: 从资本主义发展历程来看， 其全球经验 主要有两方面，

English Sentence: First, extractive industry.
Chinese Sentence: 首先是资源采掘

English Sentence: Blood diamonds, smuggled emeralds, timber, that is cut right from under the poorest.
Chinese Sentence: 血钻，宝石走私， 木材， 从穷国掠夺财富。

English Sentence: Second is technical assistance.
Chinese Sentence: 其次是技术援助。

English Sentence: And technical assistance might shock you, but it's the worst form of -- today -- of the ugly face of the developed world to the developing countries.
Chinese Sentence: 技术援助和你想的不一样， 但它是当今最差劲的形式， 它表现出了发达国家对发展中国家

English Sentence: Tens of billions of dollars are supposedly spent on building capacity with people who are paid up to 1,500 dollars a day, who are incapable of thinking creatively, or organically.
Chinese Sentence: 想象一下上百亿美元 被一些人投入能力建设 他们每天最高得到1500美元， 却不能 创造性地 独立地思考。

English Sentence: Next assumption -- and of course the events of July 7, I express my deep sympathy, and before that, September 11 -- have reminded us we do not live in three different worlds.
Chinese Sentence: 其次，当然我对 6月７日的事件 深表同情，还有９１１， 这些都提醒我们 我们不是生活在三个不同的世界，

English Sentence: We live in one world.
Chinese Sentence: 而是一个。

English Sentence: But that's easily said.
Chinese Sentence: 简单点儿说

English Sentence: But we are not dealing with the implications of the one world that we are living in.
Chinese Sentence: 我们并不是在和 我们所生活的世界的含义打交道。

English Sentence: And that is that if we want to have one world, this one world cannot be based on huge pockets of exclusion, and then inclusion for some.
Chinese Sentence: 也就是说，如果我们想要拥有一个世界， 这个世界是不能建立在 先有巨大的排斥， 然后再对其中一些进行包容之上的。

English Sentence: We must now finally come to think about the premises of a truly global world, in relationship to the regime of rights and responsibilities and accountabilities that are truly global in scope.
Chinese Sentence: 我们现在终于必须来思考一下 一个真正的全球型世界 的前提是什么， 与权力政权和 责任感和可靠性之间的关系 在全球维度内是怎样的。

English Sentence: Otherwise we will be missing this open moment in history, where we have a consensus on both the form of politics and the form of economics.
Chinese Sentence: 否则我们将会 丢失这个历史上的开放时刻， 一个我们在政治 和经济的形式 达成共识的时刻。

English Sentence: What is one of these organizations to pick?
Chinese Sentence: 这三个组织中该选哪一个呢？

English Sentence: We have three critical terms: economy, civil society and the state.
Chinese Sentence: 我们有3个很关键的术语： 经济， 公民社会 和国家。

English Sentence: I will not deal with those first two, except to say that uncritical transfer of assumptions, from one context to another, can only make for disaster.
Chinese Sentence: 我并不涉及前两个，只能说 不加批判的对假设的转移 从一个语境到另一个语境之下， 只可能酿成灾难。

English Sentence: Economics taught in most of the elite universities are practically useless in my context.
Chinese Sentence: 经济学， 在最多的精英大学里都有课程 但这在我的语境中可以说是完全没有用的。

English Sentence: My country is dominated by drug economy and a mafia.
Chinese Sentence: 我的国家 被毒品经济和黑手党所操控

English Sentence: Textbook economics does not work in my context, and I have very few recommendations from anybody as to how to put together a legal economy.
Chinese Sentence: 书本上的经济学并不能 在我的语境中发挥作用， 而且我几乎得不到任何建议。

English Sentence: The poverty of our knowledge must become the first basis of moving forward, that works on the basis of mathematical modeling, for which I have enormous respect.
Chinese Sentence: 我们知识的贫穷 必将成为前进的 第一块基石。 而不是作用于数学模型基础上的 框架， 当然，我对此还是深怀敬意的。

English Sentence: My colleagues at Johns Hopkins were among the best.
Chinese Sentence: 我的在约翰霍普金斯的同事是最好的。

English Sentence: Second, instead of debating endlessly about what is the structure of the state, why don't we simplify and say, what are a series of functions that the state in the 21st century must perform?
Chinese Sentence: 第二， 不要再无止境地去辩论 一个国家的结构是什么样的， 我们为什么不能将其简化， 而去讨论一个国家21世纪 必须具备的一系列功能是什么？

English Sentence: Clare Lockhart and I are writing a book on this; we hope to share that much widely with -- and third is that we could actually construct an index to measure comparatively how well these functions that we would agree on are being performed in different places.
Chinese Sentence: 克莱尔 洛克哈特和我正在就此写一本书 我们希望能彼此之间能够有更多的沟通与分享。 第三，我们实际上可以建立一个指数， 来测量 相比较之下，这些功能发挥得怎么样，是否令我们满意， 并且能推广到其他的地方。

English Sentence: So what are these functions?
Chinese Sentence: 那么这些功能是什么呢？

English Sentence: We propose 10.
Chinese Sentence: 我们来举10个例子。

English Sentence: And it's legitimate monopoly of means of violence, administrative control, management of public finances, investment in human capital, provision of citizenship rights, provision of infrastructure, management of the tangible and intangible assets of the state through regulation, creation of the market, international agreements, including public borrowing, and then, most importantly, rule of law.
Chinese Sentence: 它们是：对暴力途径的合法化的垄断， 行政控制，公共财政管理 人力资金投资，民权保障 基础设施建设， 通过调控进行对国家有形与无形资产管理， 市场的创造， 国际合约 -- 包括公共借贷 -- 还有最重要的是，法律规范。

English Sentence: I won't elaborate.
Chinese Sentence: 我不会进一步阐述。

English Sentence: I hope the questions will give me an opportunity.
Chinese Sentence: 我希望这些问题可以给予我一个机会。

English Sentence: This is a feasible goal, basically because, contrary to widespread assumption, I would argue that we know how to do this.
Chinese Sentence: 这是一个切实的目标， 因为与广泛的假设相反 我不认为我们知道该如何处理这件事。

English Sentence: Who would have imagined that Germany would be either united or democratic today, if you looked at it from the perspective of Oxford of 1943?
Chinese Sentence: 谁能想到德国 今天会变成联合或者民主的， 如果你从1943年的牛津的视角去看这个问题的话。

English Sentence: But people at Oxford prepared for a democratic Germany and engaged in planning.
Chinese Sentence: 但是牛津的人民为一个民主德国做好了准备， 并积极计划着。

English Sentence: And there are lots of other examples.
Chinese Sentence: 还有很多其他的例子。

English Sentence: Now in order to do this -- and this brings this group -- we have to rethink the notion of capital.
Chinese Sentence: 现在，为了做这件事， 我们必须重新思考资本的定义。

English Sentence: The least important form of capital, in this project, is financial capital -- money.
Chinese Sentence: 最微不足道的一种资本形式是， 是财经资本 -- 金钱。

English Sentence: Money is not capital in most of the developing countries.
Chinese Sentence: 金钱在众多发展中国家中不都不能算作是资本。

English Sentence: It's just cash.
Chinese Sentence: 它只是现金。

English Sentence: Because it lacks the institutional, organizational, managerial forms to turn it into capital.
Chinese Sentence: 因为它缺乏机制的， 组织的，管理的形式， 来将它转变为资本。

English Sentence: And what is required is a combination of physical capital, institutional capital, human capital -- and security, of course, is critical, but so is information.
Chinese Sentence: 而且它所需要的是 物理资本 与体制资本，人力资本的结合。 当然，安全性是至关重要的， 信息也是。

English Sentence: Now, the issue that should concern us here -- that I would like to pose to this group -- is again, it takes 16 years in your countries to produce somebody with a B.S. degree.
Chinese Sentence: 现在，我们应该担忧的问题， 同时也是我希望给您们这群人 带来的挑战是 你们国家需要16年 来培养一个 有学士学历的人。

English Sentence: It takes 20 years to produce somebody with a Ph.D.
Chinese Sentence: 20年来培养一个 有博士学位的人

English Sentence: The first challenge is to rethink, fundamentally, the issue of the time.
Chinese Sentence: 第一个挑战是要 从基本上进行重新思考 当代的问题。

English Sentence: Do we need to repeat the modalities that we have inherited?
Chinese Sentence: 我们需要重复 我们所继承的方式吗？

English Sentence: Our educational systems are inherited from the 19th century.
Chinese Sentence: 我们的教育系统是自19世纪传承而来的。

English Sentence: What is it that we need to do fundamentally to re-engage in a project, that capital formation is rapid?
Chinese Sentence: 为了从根本上重新投入到一个项目中， 什么是我们需要的呢， 在这个资本形成如此之快的当下？

English Sentence: The absolute majority of the world's population are below 20, and they are growing larger and faster.
Chinese Sentence: 世界上的绝大多数人 都在20岁以下，而且他们正在变得 更多，成长得更快。

English Sentence: They need different ways of being approached, different ways of being enfranchised, different ways of being skilled.
Chinese Sentence: 他们需要不同的方式 不同的对待的方式。 不同的享有权利的方式。 不同的被训练的方式。

English Sentence: And that's the first thing.
Chinese Sentence: 这是首要的。

English Sentence: Second is, you're problem solvers, but you're not engaging your global responsibility.
Chinese Sentence: 第二，你们是问题的解决者， 但是你们没有尽到你们的全球性责任。

English Sentence: You've stayed away from the problems of corruption.
Chinese Sentence: 你们已经远离了 腐败问题。

English Sentence: You only want clean environments in which to function.
Chinese Sentence: 你们只想看到干净的环境。

English Sentence: But if you don't think through the problems of corruption, who will?
Chinese Sentence: 但是你们没有彻底看透腐败的问题， 谁还能呢？

English Sentence: You stay away from design for development.
Chinese Sentence: 你们避免为发展做规划。

English Sentence: You're great designers, but your designs are selfish.
Chinese Sentence: 你们是伟大的设计师， 但是你们的设计是自私的。

English Sentence: It's for your own immediate use.
Chinese Sentence: 只是为了你们自己即时的用处。

English Sentence: The world in which I operate operates with designs regarding roads, or dams, or provision of electricity that have not been revisited in 60 years.
Chinese Sentence: 在我的世界，我与 那些道路、 堤坝、或者电力供应 的设计打交道， 这些设计已经有60年没有被重温了。

English Sentence: This is not right. It requires thinking.
Chinese Sentence: 这是不正确。需要我们来思考一下。

English Sentence: But, particularly, what we need more than anything else from this group is your imagination to be brought to bear on problems the way a meme is supposed to work.

English Sentence: These people are taking money and putting it in an interesting area, and I think it's a lot better than they put it in an area of a better cell phone or something -- but they're putting it in very -- areas and this will lead us into this kind of capability, and it will lead us into the next really big thing and it will allow us to explore. And I think eventually
Chinese Sentence: 这些人把钱投入一个有趣的领域， 而我认为这笔把钱 花在买一个更好的手机或其他事情上要好得多--但他们把钱投入到非常[模糊的] 区域，而这将会引导我们获得这种能力， 这将会引导我们进入下一个真正大的事件 这会让我们探索。而我认为最终

English Sentence: it will allow us to colonize and to keep us from going extinct.
Chinese Sentence: 这会让我们能够得到地盘，使我们远离灭亡。

English Sentence: They were inspired by big progress. But look at the progress that's going on after that.
Chinese Sentence: 他们被巨大的进程所鼓舞。但看看那之后的进程。

English Sentence: There were a couple of examples here.
Chinese Sentence: 这里有两个例子。

English Sentence: The military fighters had a -- highest-performance military airplane was the SR71. It went a whole life cycle, got too rusty to fly, and was taken out of service. The Concorde doubled the speed for airline travel.
Chinese Sentence: 军事战斗机有一架最高性能的空军飞机 是SR71.它走过了整个生命周期，直到锈迹斑斑才停滞飞行， 退出服役。协和式飞机使空军旅行速度翻倍。

English Sentence: It went a whole life cycle without competition, took out of service. And we're stuck back here with the same kind of capability for military fighters and commercial airline travel that we had back in the late '50s.
Chinese Sentence: 它飞过了整个生命周期，没有遇到任何竞争； 然后停飞。而我们就此卡住 拥有这样的军事战斗机 和商业航空旅行，我们回到了50年代末期。

English Sentence: But something is out there to inspire our kids now.
Chinese Sentence: 但现在出现了一些事情去鼓舞我们的孩子。

English Sentence: And I'm talking about if you've got a baby now, or if you've got a 10-year-old now.
Chinese Sentence: 我是说如果你现在有一个婴儿， 或你有一个10岁的孩子。

English Sentence: What's out there is there's something really interesting going to happen here.
Chinese Sentence: 外面正在发生一些非常有趣的事情。

English Sentence: Relatively soon, you'll be able to buy a ticket and fly higher and faster than the highest-performance military operational airplane. It's never happened before.
Chinese Sentence: 不就，你就能买张票 然后飞地比最高性能的军事作战飞机更高、更快。 这在之前从未发生过。

English Sentence: The fact that they have stuck here with this kind of performance has been, well, you know, you win the war in 12 minutes; why do you need something better?
Chinese Sentence: 事实是它们拥有着这种性能的飞行器却止步不前， 那么，你知道，你在12分钟之内赢得了这场战争， 为什么你需要更好的东西？

English Sentence: But I think when you guys start buying tickets and flying sub-orbital flights to space, very soon -- wait a minute, what's happening here, we'll have military fighters with sub-orbital capability, and I think very soon this.
Chinese Sentence: 但我认为当你们开始卖票，开始 亚轨道飞行，通往太空，很快--稍等， 这里发生了什么，我们将拥有军事战斗机 这些战斗机拥有沿亚轨道飞行的能力，我认为这很快就会发生。

English Sentence: But the interesting thing about it is the commercial guys are going to go first.
Chinese Sentence: 但有趣的是，商业飞行器现具有这种能力。

English Sentence: OK, I look forward to a new "capitalist's space race," let's call it.
Chinese Sentence: 好，我期待一场新的资本主义太空竞赛，让我们呼唤它。

English Sentence: You remember the space race in the '60s was for national prestige, because we lost the first two milestones.
Chinese Sentence: 你们还记得60年代的太空竞赛是为了国家的声誉， 因为我们丢失了最初的两个里程碑。

English Sentence: We didn't lose them technically. The fact that we had the hardware to put something in orbit when we let Von Braun fly it -- you can argue that's not a technical loss.
Chinese Sentence: 我们不是因为技术而丢失了它们。事实是我们有硬件 当我们让冯 布劳恩飞行时，我们能够把一些东西送上轨道， 你可以认为那不是科技的失败。

English Sentence: Sputnik wasn't a technical loss, but it was a prestige loss.
Chinese Sentence: 史波尼克人造卫星不是科技上的失败，但它有损声誉。

English Sentence: America -- the world saw America as not being the leader in technology, and that was a very strong thing.
Chinese Sentence: 美国--世界看到美国不是科技的主宰， 那时非常重要的事情。

English Sentence: And then we flew Alan Shepherd weeks after Gagarin, not months or decades, or whatever. So we had the capability.
Chinese Sentence: 然后我们在加加林之后几周让艾伦 谢巴德太空飞行， 不是在几个月或几十年之后，或不管多长时间。所以，我们有能力。

English Sentence: But America lost. We lost. And because of that, we made a big jump to recover it.
Chinese Sentence: 但美国失败了，我们失败了。因为那，我们向前跳跃一大步以弥补它。

English Sentence: Well, again, what's interesting here is we've lost to the Russians on the first couple of milestones already.
Chinese Sentence: 那么，再次，有趣的是我们已经输给了 俄国在前两次里程碑前。

English Sentence: You cannot buy a ticket commercially to fly into space in America -- can't do it. You can buy it in Russia.
Chinese Sentence: 在美国，你不能买一张票飞去太空-- 不能这么做。你可以在俄国买到票。

English Sentence: You can fly with Russian hardware. This is available because a Russian space program is starving, and it's nice for them to get 20 million here and there to take one of the seats.
Chinese Sentence: 你乘坐俄国的飞行器飞行。这是可以的 因为苏联的太空计划缺乏资金。 一个座位可以得到两千万美金，对他们来说很不错。

English Sentence: It's commercial. It can be defined as space tourism. They are also offering a trip to go on this whip around the moon, like Apollo 8 was done.
Chinese Sentence: 它是商业的。它可被定义为空间旅行。他们也能提供 绕月旅行，像阿波罗八号飞船所做的。

English Sentence: 100 million bucks -- hey, I can go to the moon.
Chinese Sentence: 一亿美金--嘿，我能去月球。

English Sentence: But, you know, would you have thought back in the '60s, when the space race was going on, that the first commercial capitalist-like thing to do to buy a ticket to go to the moon would be in Russian hardware?
Chinese Sentence: 但是，你知道，退回到60年代，你会想到这个吗, 那时太空竞赛正在继续， 第一个商业资本家似的事情，像是 买张票就可以去月球，这会是苏联的硬件设施吗？

English Sentence: And would you have thought, would the Russians have thought, that when they first go to the moon in their developed hardware, the guys inside won't be Russians? Maybe it'll probably be a Japanese or an American billionaire? Well, that's weird: you know, it really is.
Chinese Sentence: 那时你会想到吗，苏联人会想到吗， 当他们第一次乘坐他们开发的飞船去月球时， 里面的乘客不是俄国人？也许，会是日本的 或是美国的亿万富翁？好，有点儿奇怪，你知道，但确实如此。

English Sentence: But anyway, I think we need to beat them again.
Chinese Sentence: 但无论如何，我想我们需要再次打击他们。

English Sentence: I think what we'll do is we'll see a successful, very successful, private space flight industry. Whether we're first or not really doesn't matter.
Chinese Sentence: 我认为我们要做的会让我们看到成功的，非常成功的 私人太空飞船行业。无论我们是否是第一个真的并不重要。

English Sentence: The Russians actually flew a supersonic transport before the Concorde.
Chinese Sentence: 苏联人实际上在飞协和式飞机前就飞过超音速飞机。

English Sentence: And then they flew a few cargo flights, and took it out of service.
Chinese Sentence: 他们飞过一些货物航班，然后退役。

English Sentence: I think you kind of see the same kind of parallel when the commercial stuff is offered.
Chinese Sentence: 我想你们见到过相同的平行 当提供商业活动时。

English Sentence: OK, we'll talk just a little bit about commercial development for human space flight.
Chinese Sentence: 好，我们就谈论一点儿人类太空飞行的商业发展。

English Sentence: This little thing says here: five times what NASA's doing by 2020. I want to tell you, already there's about 1.5 billion to 1.7 billion investment in private space flight that is not government at all -- already, worldwide. If you read -- if you Google it, you'll find about half of that money, but there's twice of that being committed out there -- not spent yet, but being committed and planned for the next few years. Hey, that's pretty big.
Chinese Sentence: 这张小投影片说飞了五次 这是美国国家宇航局到2020年做的。我想要告诉你，已经 有大约十点五亿至十点七亿 投资用于私人太空飞行，这些投资完全不是来自政府； 而是来自全世界。如果你读到它--如果你搜索一下它， 你会发现一半的资金，但有两倍 正准备投入那里的资金--还没有花，但正准备投入 计划到未来几年。嘿，那数目非常大。

English Sentence: I'm predicting, though, as profitable as this industry is going to be -- and it certainly is profitable when you fly people at 200,000 dollars on something that you can actually operate at a tenth of that cost, or less -- this is going to be very profitable.
Chinese Sentence: 我正在预测，尽管，这个工业的收益会很客观 并且它确实是收益的，当你花200000美元让你的朋友乘飞船旅行时 事实上你可以只花费十分之一， 或更少--这收入会非常客观。

English Sentence: I predict, also, that the investment that will flow into this will be somewhere around half of what the U.S. taxpayer spends for NASA's manned spacecraft work.
Chinese Sentence: 我还预测，会注入此项事业的投资 将会有相当于美国税收的一半之多 这些投资会用于美国国家宇航局的人造宇宙飞船工作。

English Sentence: And every dollar that flows into that will be spent more efficiently by a factor of 10 to 15. And what that means is before we know it, the progress in human space flight, with no taxpayer dollars, will be at a level of about five times as much as the current NASA budgets for human space flight.
Chinese Sentence: 注入此项事业的每一美元都会被更有效地利用 大约相差10到15。这意味着在我们之前就知道， 人类太空飞行的进程，没有用纳税人的钱， 将会比现在美国国家宇航局的预算多五倍 该预算用于人类太空飞行。

English Sentence: And that is because it's us. It's private industry.
Chinese Sentence: 那是因为是我们。它是私人的行业。

English Sentence: You should never depend on the government to do this sort of stuff -- and we've done it for a long time. The NACA, before NASA, never developed an airliner and never ran an airline.
Chinese Sentence: 你从不应该依赖政府去做这种事业-- 而且我们已经从事了很长时间。美国航空资讯委员会，在美国国家宇航局之前， 从未开发过客机，而且从未运营过航空线。

English Sentence: And so cars, as art, brings it into an emotional plane -- if you accept that -- that you have to deal with on the same level you would with art with a capital A.

English Sentence: Now at this point you're going to see a picture of Michelangelo.

English Sentence: This is completely different than automobiles.
Chinese Sentence: 这和汽车截然不同

English Sentence: Automobiles are self-moving things, right? Elevators are automobiles.
Chinese Sentence: 汽车就是自己会移动，对吧？那电梯也会自己动。

English Sentence: And they're not very emotional; they solve a purpose; and certainly automobiles have been around for 100 years and have made our lives functionally a lot better in many ways; they've also been a real pain in the ass, because automobiles are really the thing we have to solve.
Chinese Sentence: 它们都没有情感，它们用作某种用途 当然汽车已经有100年左右的历史了 而且在很多方面让我们的生活更好。 它们也一直带来问题 因为汽车是我们必须要解决的东西

English Sentence: We have to solve the pollution, we have to solve the congestion -- but that's not what interests me in this speech.
Chinese Sentence: 我们得解决污染的问题，解决交通阻塞的问题 但那不是我这次想说的

English Sentence: What interests me in this speech is cars. Automobiles may be what you use, but cars are what we are, in many ways.

English Sentence: And as long as we can solve the problems of automobiles, and I believe we can, with fuel cells or hydrogen, like BMW is really hip on, and lots of other things, then I think we can look past that and try and understand why this hook is in many of us -- of this car-y-ness -- and what that means, what we can learn from it.

English Sentence: That's what I want to get to. Cars are not a suit of clothes; cars are an avatar. Cars are an expansion of yourself: they take your thoughts, your ideas, your emotions, and they multiply it -- your anger, whatever. It's an avatar.

English Sentence: Cars are a sculpture -- did you know this?
Chinese Sentence: 你知道吗？汽车也是雕像。

English Sentence: That every car you see out there is sculpted by hand.

English Sentence: Many people think, "Well, it's computers, and it's done by machines and stuff like that."
Chinese Sentence: 许多人认为，“嗯，那是电脑做的， 是由机器那类的东西完成的。”

English Sentence: Well, they reproduce it, but the originals are all done by hand.

Chinese Sentence: 他们把相同的迫切感投入到汽车的塑造中， 就像在做一件能放进博物馆的伟大的雕塑。

Chinese Sentence: 那种迫切感，探索，创新的动力， 同时还有对于工艺的责任感 这些在汽车和其他任何东西一样强烈

English Sentence: It's that will to live, that need to survive, to express itself, that comes in a car, and takes over people like me.

Chinese Sentence: 我们正在测算，在我们每天呼吸的空气中 特别是在飞机 和礼堂等封闭环境中

English Sentence: We filter through some simple apparatuses; we collect on the order of a billion microbes from just a day filtering on top of a building in New York City.

English Sentence: And we're in the process of sequencing all that Just on the data collection side, just where we are through the Galapagos, we're finding that almost every 200 miles, we see tremendous diversity in the samples in the ocean.

English Sentence: Some of these make logical sense, in terms of different temperature gradients.
